description: To provide scholarship assistance to declared Insurance & Risk Management majors. Eligibility Requirements US Citizen Cumulative GPA of 3.0 Insurance & Risk Management majors Selection Process Preference will be given to Oklahoma residents and incoming sophomores or juniors

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

criteria.description: SIS_Classification is Sophomore   and SIS_Classification is Junior   and SIS_Classification is Senior
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Classification is Sophomore   and SIS_Classification is Junior   and SIS_Classification is Senior

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2 is Finance-Insurance & Risk Mgmt   or SIS_Major is Finance-Insurance & Risk Mgmt   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Finance-Insurance & Risk Mgmt   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Finance-Insurance & Risk Mgmt
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major_2 is Finance-Insurance & Risk Mgmt   or SIS_Major is Finance-Insurance & Risk Mgmt   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Finance-Insurance & Risk Mgmt   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Finance-Insurance & Risk Mgmt
